doc.title: Comienza una reforma
doc.plot: Short documentary about the 'Ley de Educación' (Spanish Education Law), 'Educación General Básica' (Spanish primary studies), Educación Universitaria (Spanish universitary studies), 'Formación Profesional' (Spanish secondary professional studies), 'Universidad para mayores de 25 años' (University for people over 25 years old), and the 'Museo de Arte Contemporáneo' (Contemporary Art Museum) in Madrid
